column4: i hear u, i just upgraded to dapper last nyte from hoary, & java, works, & dvd play is less jumpy
will edgy be a smooth upgrade from dapper? not like from hoary to breezy?
i doubt that. i had to delete my old dapper partition just to install edgy beta. T_T
yeah - thats why i installed it. it looks so cool, and it hadnt broken yet for me.
